summary: Manila is the capital and second-most populous city in the Philippines. Located on Luzon island, it's known for its high population density. The city has a rich history, dating back to a Tagalog polity called Maynila in 1258. Spanish conquistador Miguel LÃ³pez de Legazpi established Intramuros, a fortified city, in 1571. Manila served as the capital of the Spanish East Indies and is now a global city with strong economic performance. It's part of Metro Manila, a bustling metropolitan area.
title: Manila
